thread.title: Star-studded Super Bowl LI Culinary Kickoff gets wild in Houston

author: John Boyd, Houston Chronicle
title: Star-studded Super Bowl LI Culinary Kickoff gets wild in Houston
text:

(Photo by Jason Kempin/Getty Images for #Culinary Kickoff) Photo: Jason Kempin/Getty Images For #Culinary Kicko Image 26 of 26 Star-studded Super Bowl LI Culinary Kickoff gets wild in Houston 1 / 26 Back to Gallery 
While you're Super Bowl gameday grub may largely consist of pizza, beer and wings (ain't nothing wrong with that), high-rollers in Houston expect a more refined dining experience for their Super Bowl trip. 
Last night, Brennan's of Houston hosted the biggest culinary event of Super Bowl LI weekend with the annual Culinary Kickoff. 
The star-studded, four-course dinner featured VIP, such as Hall of Fame running back Marshall Faulk, and Olympic gold medal-winning gymnast Simone Biles, who dined on the food of celebrity chefs Michael Mina and Charlie Palmer. 
The $1,250-per-plate meal included a cocktail reception with celebrity winemakers and an exclusive after party. 
Check out some of the best sights and bites from the night in the photos above. 
.
